verbs.description: The gap between how men and women in Wisconsin view President Donald Trump [V: has] grown wider than ever as his standing improves with men but remains weak with women .
[ARG1: The gap between how men and women in Wisconsin view President Donald Trump] has [V: grown] [ARG2: wider than ever] [ARGM-ADV: as his standing improves with men but remains weak with women] .
The gap between how men and women in Wisconsin view President Donald Trump has grown wider than ever as [ARG1: his standing] [V: improves] [ARGM-LOC: with men] but remains weak with women .
The gap between how men and women in Wisconsin view President Donald Trump has grown wider than ever as [ARG1: his standing] improves with men but [V: remains] [ARG3: weak with women] .
